author: Clare Wilson
title: Hepatitis C infection rates are being cut by testing and treatment
description: The infection is being eliminated as a public health threat by countries that introduce widespread testing and treatment for those at risk, and it seems to be working
content:
By Clare Wilson
Testing is helping to tackle the hepatitis C virus
Jarun011/Getty Images
There is one deadly infection that we can beat: the virus that causes hepatitis C. This liver disease-causing virus was on a global rampage a decade ago, but is being … [+2286 chars]
